RSBP01
Super Smash Bros. Brawl

Game&Watch Light Blue Costume Color Modifier [Macopride64]
284A646E 00006A22
2861E332 00000014
F6000002 90809260
00000078 005E0000
00010003 0000012C
14000098 VVVVVV00
140000B4 XXXXXX00
1400B978 YYYYYY00
1400B994 ZZZZZZ00
E0000000 80008000
*FOR G&W COLOR MODIFIERS ABOVE*
V= Main Color
X= Main Outline Color
Y= Objects Main Color
Z= Objects Outline Color
'Objects' color modify his nair (fishtank), bair (crab), final smash (octopus).
Only working for P1 at the moment.
COLOR VALUES FOR CODES ABOVE @ www.2createawebsite.com/images/hex-co1.gif
or generate your color of choice @ www.2createawebsite.com/build/hex-colors.html#colorgenerator

Spectator Mode Codes

Countdown Ends Instantly [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F3198420 02953501
38000000 00000000
*Matches start instantly*

Frozen Countdown [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F3198424 02879D01
60000000 00000000
*Matches never start*

Infinite Coins [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F3197634 02951201
3800270F 00000000
*Every time you enter spectator mode, your coins will be 9999*

Starting Bet Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F3199C28 02388002
3BA0XXXX 93BC0520
60000000 00000000
*XXXX = Hex*
*You can go higher than the in-game limit of 100 coins on stake using this code*
*Modify your bet afterwards if you wish, but it will jump to 100 or less if it was higher than 100 and if you tried to increase*

2D stage Z axis scale modifier [standardtoaster]
046F3EE0 XXXXXXXX
3D8F5C29 (0.07) is default

Level Freezer (ported to PAL by ) Phantom Wings, Almas [standardtoaster]
42000000 90000000
04178B24 XXXXXXXX
2A180EA8 000000SS
04178B24 3F800000
E0000000 80008000

XXXXXXXX is floating point
SS is stage id.
More info on this code at http://www.smashboards.com/showpost.php?p=11892628&postcount=5

-These codes do NOT change player characters into Bosses
-These codes do NOT work in SSE
-Use Gamecube controller in the 3rd port D-Pad and other buttons
-Some moves are not enabled in order to prevent freezing
-Press START to self-destruct

Face Any Which WayPhantom Wings ported by Thewill [Thewill]
80000000 8061CCE0
80000001 00000000
60000006 00000000
60000003 00000001
4A001000 00000000
4A101001 00000000
36000000 00000032
58010000 00000004
DE000000 80008180
58010000 00000060
58010000 00000018
14000060 XXXXXXXX
80100001 00000008
62000000 00000001
E2000002 00000000
80000001 00000000
80100000 00000244
62000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
XXXXXXXX Takes floating point values, more specifically, angles.
If you use a number greater than 360 the game will subtract 360 until it is between 0 and
360.
For example, you put in 560, thats the same as putting in 200.(560 - 360 = 200)
Just stay between 0 and 360.(360 and 0 produce the same effect)
Here are some starter angles.
0 = 00000000
45 = 42340000
90 = 42B40000
135 = 43070000
180 = 43340000
225 = 43610000
270 = 43870000
315 = 439D8000
360 = 43B40000

40820008 3B8000F8
939E0038 00000000
While Performing Great Aether use the following commands:
Hold Z to do Bring them down to the ground.
Hold B to knock them into the air.
Release all buttons to end the combo.

R+L+Up(Dpad) To save coordinates
R+L+Down(Dpad) To teleport to coordinates
To change the teleport command change this line [Thewill]
205BA488 00000064
Do not change the coordinate saving command

Allowed WiFi Codes

WiFi Character Color Modifier *Non-Host* [Bully@Wiiplaza]
0467BF90 3BA0000L
*L = Color values*
*Working on Waiting Room also*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCghsksEI2E

WITH ANYONE - Basic Brawl Multiplayer Phantom Wings, Ported by [Fred]
4A000000 9018ED64
38000000 00FF1000
10000000 0000000C
Must Be Host. You must also start the Waiting Room before someone else joins (like having someone join your game instead of you joining theirs). Sometimes when 3 other players join you at once you need to drop out and rejoin again. Also note that you must join with a right player order.

WITH ANYONE - Team Battle Multiplayer Phantom Wings & Jose Gallardo, Ported by [Fred]
4A000000 9018ED64
38000000 00FF1100
10000000 0000000C
Works without being the host, but the same rule applies for starting the Waiting Room before others join (have them join while you are in the waiting room). Note that there is no rule saying that you and your friend will be on the same team when joining multiplayer, and as usual it takes more time to join multiplayer fights than basic brawl. Also note that you must join with a right player order.

Game mechanics

Can Always Start Match [Bully@Wiiplaza]
04684C50 48000024
*Do not start a match with no players, it will get stuck at result screen*
*Credits to Iggleboo*

0401C5D0 48000028
2001CA1D 41820028
0401CA1C 48000028

Big thanks to Link for helping to get this code ported!

Allow Replays Longer Than Three Minutes [brkirch]
040ED354 60000000
To save the replay, just press the button you normally would to save replays (the save replay button will not appear on screen).

Match settings [Link]
4A000000 9018F128
14000020 SSTTUUVV
14000024 WWXXYYZZ
E0000000 80008000
Original by Heinermann:

SS
0x04 - Match is a Tournament
0x08 - Match is Multi-Man Brawl
0x20 - Stadium Game

TT
0x01 - Timer counts up
0x02 - Score Match
0x04 - BTT
0x08 - HRC
0x10 - Unknown (#players?)
0x20 - Stock Match? (#players?)
0x40 - Coin Match

UU
0x01 - Team Attack
0x02 - Timer counts up
0x10 - HRC
0x80 - Match is Timed

VV
0x02 - Hide the damage gauge
0x04 - Unknown (not stock)
0x08 - Allow pausing
0x20 - HP-based Match

WW
0x01 - Match is BTT
0x08 - Fixed Camera
0x10 - Angled Camera
0x80 - Don't use score

XX
0x20 - Players???

YY
0x20 - Difficulty (3 bits)

ZZ
Unknown

Mushroom/Lightning related

Mushroom Stacker first try [Link]
C2891568 00000002
7C23052E E3E10018
60000000 00000000
0483E0F0 38800000
0483E110 38800000
0483DEA8 38800001
04B84808 3F3504F3
Limitations: any real-time character change (includes but probably not limited to: Zelda&lt;&gt;Shiek, Samus&lt;&gt;Zero Suit Samus, Pokmon Swaps) will reset your size! Dying will also but this is way it is intended to be. Includes lightning!

Super Mushroom growth factor: [Link]
04B84800 XXXXXXXX
Normally 3FD9999A=170%..

Poison Mushroom "growth" factor: [Link]
04B84808 XXXXXXXX
Normally 3F000000=50%
In case the stacker is on, this value gets overwritten with 71% (3F3504F3) - this has technical reasons because the game seems to execute the shrink command twice.. while in regular game mode you still appear with 50% of your size, with the stacker it would be only 25%

Normal Lightning (shrinking you or enemies) factor: [Link]
04B84824 XXXXXXXX
Normally 3F000000=50%

WTF Lightning (enlarging enemies) factor: [Link]
04B8481C XXXXXXXX
Normally 4019999A=240%

00 (0) - Battle

Pokemon IDs
Original by Heinermann
XX:
01000000 = Togepi
02000000 = Goldeen
04000000 = Gardevoir
08000000 = Wobbuffet
10000000 = Suicune
20000000 = Bonsly
00010000 = Lugia
00020000 = Manaphy
00040000 = Weavile
00080000 = Electrode
00100000 = Metagross
00200000 = No Pokemon
00400000 = Meowth
00800000 = Piplup
00000100 = Gulpin
00000200 = Staryu
00000400 = Ho-oh
00000800 = No Pokeball
000001000 = Snorlax
000002000 = Bellossom
000004000 = Kyogre
000008000 = Latios & Latias
00000001 = Torchic
00000002 = No Pokeball

02000000 Waluigi
04000000 Dr. Wright

00080000 Isaac
00100000 Saki Amamiya
00200000 Shadow

00800000 Infantry and Tanks
00000100 Lakitu
00000200 Knuckle Joe

00000800 Helirin

00002000 Jill & Drill Dozer

00000020 Devil

00000080 Jeff

Dark character info
Original by Y.S.
Attention: Only works with very few characters!

Status modifier information
Original by Y.S.
XX and YY are both calculated.. the calculations starts with 00 for both.
XX
+04 Invisible
+10 Metal
(14 would be invisible and metal as: 00 (base)+04 (Inv)+10 (Metal)=14)
YY
+01 Reflect
+02 Curry
+04 Flower
+08 Bunny hood
+80 HP

Color modifier information
Original by Y.S.
XX: Possible colors
00-05 Normal 6 colors
06-0B Wario's 6 colors
0C Emerald (subspace, only some char)

Size information
Original by Y.S.
XXXXXXXX = Floating point number.. Examples:
1.0 = 3F800000 (normal size)
2.0 = 40000000 (double size)
4.0 = 40800000 (quadro)
0.5 = 3F000000 (half)
0.25 = 3E800000 (quarter)

General FP info
Original by Y.S.
XXXXXXXX = Floating point number (examples)
1.0 = 3F800000
2.0 = 40000000
4.0 = 40800000
0.5 = 3F000000
0.25 = 3E800000

Defense ratio info
Original by Y.S.
XXXXXXXX = Floating point number
C0000000 --> Almost Invincible
1.0 = 3F800000
2.0 = 40000000
4.0 = 40800000
0.5 = 3F000000
0.25 = 3E800000

There are also conversion apps for converting hexadecimal to floating point!

There are also conversion apps for converting hexadecimal to floating point!

There are also conversion apps for converting hexadecimal to floating point!

There are also conversion apps for converting hexadecimal to floating point!

There are also conversion apps for converting hexadecimal to floating point!

There are also conversion apps for converting hexadecimal to floating point!

Universal Codes for Super Smash Bros. Brawl

Button activator master codes

Wii Remote [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
70E09FFF 807F0000
D2000004 00000002
807F0000 3D808000
B06C1602 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Classic Controller Pro [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
7D8643D6 A0C5002A
D2000004 00000002
A0C5002A 3D808000
B0CC15FE 00000000
E0000000 80008000

GameCube Controller [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
A0060000 901F0000
D2000008 00000002
A0060000 3D808000
B00C1600 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5RnICD5E3mc

Button activators that require their master code to be functional

Wii Remote [Bully@Wiiplaza]
28001602 YYYYZZZZ

Classic Controller Pro [Bully@Wiiplaza]
280015FE YYYYZZZZ

GameCube Controller [Bully@Wiiplaza]
28001600 YYYYZZZZ

WiFi codes that require "host" to work

Assist Trophy Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
3B7B0008 807C019C
D2000008 00000002
3C00IIII 6000IIII
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*IIIIIIII = Assist Trophy value*
*Credits to Deathwolf*

Pokmon Ball Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
807C0198 1C000218
D2000010 00000002
3C00PPPP 6000PPPP
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*PPPPPPPP = Pokmon value*
*Credits to Deathwolf*

WiFi Damage Ratio Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
88DE0005 98DF0004
14000008 38A000QQ
E0000000 80008000
*QQ = 01 (0.1) till FF (25.5)*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jjlu5iBdbA0

WiFi codes that require host to work and (only) apply to all other players in the room

Music Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
B0040076 80050008
D200000C 00000002
3C00FF00 6000MMMM
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*MMMM = Music value*
*Also working for yourself*
*Credits to Deathwolf*

Force Specific Character [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
906400A4 900400A0
D2000010 00000002
906400A8 398000KK
998400AA 00000000
D2000020 00000002
906400B0 398000KK
998400B2 00000000
D2000030 00000002
906400B8 398000KK
998400BA 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*KK = Character value*
*The 1st KK's are for P1, the 2nd for P2 and the 3rd for P3 (on same away Wii)*
*Thanks to Kplmondo for making me aware of previous flaw in the code (not affecting all players on same away Wii)*
*Credits to Deathwolf*

Force Specific Character Color [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
906400A4 900400A0
D2000018 00000002
3980000L 998400AB
80650040 00000000
D2000028 00000002
3980000L 998400B3
80650048 00000000
D2000038 00000002
3980000L 998400BB
88050050 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*L = Color value*
*The 1st L is for P1, the 2nd for P2 and the 3rd for P3 (on same away Wii)*
*Thanks to Kplmondo for making me aware of previous flaw in the code (not affecting all players on same away Wii)*
*Credits to Deathwolf*

Force Specific Team Color [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
906400A4 900400A0
D2000014 00000002
900400AC 3980000T
998400AC 00000000
D2000024 00000002
900400B4 3980000T
998400B4 00000000
D2000034 00000002
900400BC 3980000T
998400BC 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*T = Team Color value, see below*
*The 1st TT's are for P1, the 2nd for P2 and the 3rd for P3 (on same away Wii)*
*Thanks to Kplmondo for making me aware of previous flaw in the code (not affecting all players on same away Wii)*

WiFi codes that work all the time, no matter if host or not

Frozen Character Selection Timer [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
2C04012C 909E0618
14000004 60000000
E0000000 80008000

2C04012C 909E607C
14000004 60000000
E0000000 80008000

F6000001 80008180
3804003B 909F0664
14000004 60000000
E0000000 80008000

Music Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
1C000218 7C7F0214
D2000040 00000002
3CC0FF00 60C6MMMM
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*MMMM = Music values*
*If host, all others will still hear the default music*
*Thanks to Kplmondo for testing with me*
*Credits to Deathwolf*

Item Spawn Ratio Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
80A3000C 7CC00038
1400001C 3800000R
E0000000 80008000
*R values*
0 = None
1 = Low
2 = Med
3 = High
4 = Item Rain
*Credits to Corey64*
*Freezes very easily*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3LQulWY8_aY

Override Other Item Spawn Ratio Options [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
88C700C6 80A7008C
1400000C 3880000R
E0000000 80008000
*R value, see above*
*Thanks to Kplmondo for helping to find this code*
*Can be used with "Item Spawn Ratio Modifier" to force any ratio all the time*

Universal Stage Vote Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
38A00000 7CA32B78
1400002C 386000SS
E0000000 80008000
*SS = Stage value*
*Offline compatible*
*Credits to Deathwolf*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BEJH0UjJkR4

E0000000 80008000

907D0258 80FD0200
D2000000 00000002

906C00A0 00000000

Character Color Selection Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
809801B8 7F03C378
14000014 3BA0000L
14000014 3B80000L
E0000000 80008000
*L = Color value*
*Note: If your game is PAL, delete the second "14" line, otherwise delete the first "14" line*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bpjklxlkcEc

Character Team Color Selection Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
809801C0 38600015
14000014 3800000T
140000F0 3880000T
E0000000 80008000
*T = Team Color value*
0 = Red
1 = Blue
2 = Green
*Both T's must be identical*

Character Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
93D10020 9BD10013
14000020 380000KK
14000E9C 386000KK
14001F1C 386000KK
14002C40 386000KK
F6000001 80008100
989E0016 881D00B8
14000004 380000KK
E0000000 80008000

*You're supposed to fill out all KK values with the same value*

Default Selection Modifiers

Difficulty [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
5400FF7E 901E05E0
14000010 3800000X
E0000000 80008000
*X Values*
0 = Easy / Target Smash!! Level 1
1 = Medium / Target Smash! Level 2
2 = Hard / Target Smash! Level 3
3 = Very Hard / Target Smash! Level 4
4 = Intense / Target Smash! Level 5

Lives [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
5400FF7E 901E05E0
140002A4 3800000X
E0000000 80008000
*X = Hex (0 - 5)*

981F0016 881F0009
D200001C 00000003
887E00B8 2C0300XX
40820008 386000YY
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XX = Character to replace*
*YY = Character instead*

WiFi (Friends) Brawl: Game Mode Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
7F43D378 38910014
14000040 380000GG
E0000000 80008000
*Credits to Jose Gallardo & Phantom Wings*
*GG values*
00 = (Offline) Brawl
01 = (Offline) Loser Out (Can't play or exit)
02 = (Offline) Special Brawl
04 = (Offline) Classic
05 = (Offline) All-Star
06 = (Offline) Boss Battles
07 = (Offline) Target Smash!!
08 = (Offline) Home-Run Contest
09 = (Offline) Multi-Man Brawl
0A = (Offline) Training
